verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> concerning all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that was the <S%H7224>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

The which <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and to all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

From the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that is the <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has come unto <S%H1696>me<s%>, and I have spoken unto <S%H7925>you<s%>, rising early and <S%H1696>speaking<s%>; but you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto you all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, rising <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H8085>them<s%>; but you have not listened, nor <S%H5186>inclined<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

They <S%H559>said<s%>, Turn <S%H7725>again<s%> now every <S%H376>one<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and from the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%>, and <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> unto you and to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>:

And <S%H3212>go<s%> not <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7812>them<s%>, and to worship <S%H3707>them<s%>, and provoke me not to anger with the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%>; and I will do you no <S%H7489>hurt<s%>.

Yet you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; that you might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> to your own <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; Because you have not <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>,

<S%H7971>Behold<s%>, I will send and <S%H3947>take<s%> all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them against this <S%H776>land<s%>, and against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H1471>there<s%>, and against all these nations round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and will utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H7760>them<s%>, and make them a <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H8322>hissing<s%>, and <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2723>desolations<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H6>take<s%> from them the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride<s%>, the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7347>millstones<s%>, and the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H5216>candle<s%>.

And this whole <S%H776>land<s%> shall be a <S%H2723>desolation<s%>, and a <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>; and these <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H7657>pass<s%>, when seventy <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H4390>accomplished<s%>, that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and that <S%H1471>nation<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, and will <S%H7760>make<s%> it <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolations<s%>.

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon that <S%H776>land<s%> all my <S%H1697>words<s%> which I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> against <S%H3789>it<s%>, even all that is written in this <S%H5612>book<s%>, which <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> against all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

For <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> themselves of them <S%H7999>also<s%>: and I will recompense them according to their <S%H6467>deeds<s%>, and according to the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> unto <S%H3947>me<s%>; Take the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> of this <S%H2534>fury<s%> at my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and cause all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, to whom I <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H8248>you<s%>, to drink it.
And they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and be <S%H1607>moved<s%>, and be <S%H1984>mad<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> that I will send among <S%H7971>them<s%>.

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> I the <S%H3563>cup<s%> at the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and made all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>, unto whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had sent <S%H7971>me<s%>:

To <S%H3389>know<s%>, Jerusalem, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H8269>there<s%>, and the princes <S%H5414>there<s%>, to make them a <S%H2723>desolation<s%>, a <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, a <S%H8322>hissing<s%>, and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>; as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>;
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and his <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>;

And all the <S%H6153>mingled<s%> <S%H4428>people<s%>, and all the kings of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz<s%>, and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%>, and <S%H5804>Azzah<s%>, and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>, and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>,
<S%H123>Edom<s%>, and <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>,

And all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>, and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H339>islands<s%> which are <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>,
<S%H1719>Dedan<s%>, and <S%H8485>Tema<s%>, and <S%H938>Buz<s%>, and all that are in the <S%H7112>farthest<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%>,
And all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6152>Arabia<s%>, and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the mingled <S%H6153>people<s%> that <S%H7931>live<s%> in the <S%H4057>desert<s%>,
And all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H2174>Zimri<s%>, and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes<s%>,

And all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, <S%H7350>far<s%> and <S%H7138>near<s%>, <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another<s%>, and all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>world<s%>, which are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8347>Sheshach<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.

Therefore you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H8354>Drink<s%> <S%H7937>you<s%>, and be drunken, and <S%H7006>vomit<s%>, and <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and <S%H6965>rise<s%> no <S%H6440>more<s%>, because of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> which I will send among <S%H7971>you<s%>.

And it shall <S%H3985>be<s%>, if they refuse to <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>, then shall you <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; You shall <S%H8354>certainly<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

<S%H2490>For<s%>, behold, I begin to bring <S%H7489>evil<s%> on the <S%H5892>city<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and should you be <S%H5352>utterly<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>? You shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>: for I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for a <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> you against them all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3068>them<s%>, The Lord shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> from on <S%H4791>high<s%>, and <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation<s%>; he shall <S%H7580>mightily<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> upon his <S%H5116>habitation<s%>; he shall <S%H6030>give<s%> a <S%H1959>shout<s%>, as they that <S%H1869>tread<s%> the <S%H3427>grapes<s%>, against all the inhabitants of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

A <S%H7588>noise<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> even to the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, he will <S%H8199>plead<s%> with all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; he will <S%H5414>give<s%> them that are <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H7451>Behold<s%>, evil shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> shall be raised <S%H5782>up<s%> from the <S%H3411>coasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be at that <S%H3117>day<s%> from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> even unto the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: they shall not be <S%H5594>lamented<s%>, neither <S%H622>gathered<s%>, nor <S%H6912>buried<s%>; they shall be <S%H1828>dung<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%>.

<S%H3213>Howl<s%>, you <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and <S%H2199>cry<s%>; and <S%H6428>wallow<s%> yourselves in the <S%H117>ashes<s%>, you principal of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>: for the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2873>slaughter<s%> and of your <S%H8600>dispersions<s%> are <S%H4390>accomplished<s%>; and you shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> like a <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>.
And the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> shall have no <S%H4498>way<s%> to <S%H6>flee<s%>, nor the <S%H117>principal<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> to <S%H6413>escape<s%>.

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and a <S%H3215>howling<s%> of the <S%H117>principal<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, shall be <S%H3068>heard<s%>: for the Lord has <S%H7703>spoiled<s%> their <S%H4830>pasture<s%>.
And the <S%H7965>peaceable<s%> <S%H4999>habitations<s%> are cut <S%H1826>down<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

He has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> his <S%H5520>covert<s%>, as the <S%H3715>lion<s%>: for their <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H8047>desolate<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of the <S%H3238>oppressor<s%>, and <S%H6440>because<s%> of his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>.
